weka.attributeSelection.ssf.distanceFunctions
Class SymmetricalUncertaintySupervised

java.lang.Object
  weka.attributeSelection.ssf.distanceFunctions.DistanceFunctionForSSF
      weka.attributeSelection.ssf.distanceFunctions.PreBuiltDistanceMatrix
          weka.attributeSelection.ssf.distanceFunctions.SymmetricalUncertainty
              weka.attributeSelection.ssf.distanceFunctions.SymmetricalUncertaintySupervised
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, DiscreteDistance, SupervisedDistanceFunctionForSSF, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler
public class SymmetricalUncertaintySupervised
extends SymmetricalUncertainty
implements DiscreteDistance, java.io.Serializable, SupervisedDistanceFunctionForSSF, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler

Symmetrical Uncertainty adapted to consider feature-class correlation. For more informatio see: Thiago F. Covões, Eduardo R. Hruschka (2011). Towards Improving Cluster-Based Feature Selection with a Simplified Silhouette Filter. Information Sciences. 181(18):3766-3782.

BibTeX: 

 @article{Covões2011,
    author = {Thiago F. Covões and Eduardo R. Hruschka},
    journal = {Information Sciences},
    number = {18},
    pages = {3766-3782},
    title = {Towards Improving Cluster-Based Feature Selection with a Simplified Silhouette Filter},
    volume = {181},
    year = {2011},
    ISSN = {0020-0255}
 }

Valid options are: 

 -F <discretizer spec>
  Specify the discretizer algorithm for continuous features

See Also:
Serialized Form
